name: Doxepin hydrochloride
indications: Doxepin tablets are indicated for the treatment of insomnia characterized by difficulty with sleep maintenance. The clinical trials performed in support of efficacy were up to 3 months in duration.
contraindications: The dose of doxepin tablets should be individualized.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Doxepin 6 mg tablets are oval shaped, light yellow, identified with debossed markings of “135” on one side and “m” on the other side, and are supplied as:
                  
                  NDC: 70518-4297-00
                  NDC: 70518-4297-01
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BOX
                  PACKAGING: 1 in 1 POUCH
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Protect from light.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions: Hypersensitivity to doxepin hydrochloride, inactive ingredients, or other dibenzoxepines. ( 4.1 ) Co-administration with Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitors (MAOIs): Do not administer if patient is taking MAOIs or has used MAOIs within the past two weeks. ( 4.2 ) Untreated narrow angle glaucoma or severe urinary retention. ( 4.3 )
